title: What do you need to prepare for camping?

korean: 캠핑 가려면 준비할 게 정말 많아.
요리 도구도 준비해야 하는데, 코펠이랑 버너가 기본이야.
처음에는 챙길 게 많아서 힘들지만, 익숙해지면 괜찮아.
english: There's really a lot to prepare for camping.
First of all, basically a tent and sleeping bag are essential.
You have to choose a sleeping bag suitable for the season.
Summer and winter ones are different.
It's convenient if you have a mattress or air mat too.
The ground is hard, so it's tough to sleep directly on it.
You must also bring a lantern or flashlight.
You really need it when it gets dark at night.
You also need to prepare cooking utensils, with a cookset and burner being basic.
Also pack enough food ingredients and water.
Extra clothes and warm clothes are also needed.
It's good to have mosquito repellent and a first aid kit too.
At first it's hard because there's a lot to pack, but once you get used to it, it's okay.
